column4: Hi - I'm running the new Ubuntu update (Lynx), and it's currently on th 'installing the upgrades' section. Has been going to about 90 minutes already - is progressing, but incredibly slowly (which is odd, since my machine is uber powerfull). The estimated time has not decreased for about an hour!!
My system  load is very high, sitting at 2.62
is this normall during the upgrade?
